description.value:
Fire

Aura 2

(aura 3 while the balor is bloodied); any enemy that starts its turn within the aura takes 5 fire damage (10 fire damage while the balor is bloodied).

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Lightning, Weapon

Standard

Reach 3

+24 vs AC; 3d10 + 5 lightning damage (crit 4d10 + 5), plus 5 lightning damage while bloodied.

At-Will ✦ Fire, Weapon

Standard

Reach 5

+22 vs Reflex; 2d8 + 5 damage, plus 5 fire damage while bloodied, the target takes ongoing 10 fire damage (save ends), and the target is pulled 4 squares to a space adjacent to the unbound balor.

At-Will

Standard

The unbound balor makes a lightning sword attack and a flame whip attack (in either order).

At-Will

Immediate Reaction

Trigger: When damaged by an attack from an enemy within 3 squares, at-will

The balor makes a lightning sword attack against the triggering enemy, then flies half its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Necrotic

Minor, Recharge

Ranged 10

+22 vs Will; 1d6 + 8 necrotic damage, and the target is restrained (save ends). Aftereffect: The target takes 10 necrotic damage.

Encounter

Trigger: When reduced to 0 hit points, encounter

+22 vs Reflex; 5d10 fire damage. Miss: Half damage. close burst 10

Move, Recharges When First Bloodied

Close burst 3

Trigger: When first bloodied

No attack roll; the target is pushed 1d6 squares and knocked prone. If the unbound balor is bloodied, the target also takes ongoing 5 fire damage. Effect: The balor flies its speed..

FireZone

Standard, Recharges When First Bloodied

Close blast 5

Trigger: When first bloodied

+22 vs Reflex; 3d8 + 7 fire damage. Effect: The blast becomes a zone of abyssal flames until the end of the encounter. Any creature that enters the zone or starts its turn there takes 10 fire damage.

system.biography:
HP 816; Bloodied 408
Resist 20 fire, 15 variable (3/encounter) Immune fear 		Init +15 | AP 2 | Save +5
AC 35Fort 35Ref 31Will 33
Speed 8, fly 12 (clumsy)
Ability ScoresStr 25 (+17)
Con 28 (+19)		Dex 21 (+15)
Int 13 (+11)		Wis 24 (+17)
Cha 13 (+11)
Languages Abyssal, Common
Alignment Chaotic evil
Senses Truesight 6
Passive Perception 27 | Insight 27

Equipment lightning sword, flame whip
